TextBody:
Hello Mohammed,

Thank you for contacting our Support department.

We have scheduled a remote session on Monday at 15:30 IST, where we can help you create a department.

The meeting link has been sent via email.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ChBfd:ref
Subject: Need support to create department    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ChBfd:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for your time in today's session.

In the meeting we have checked what is causing the issue. 

I have investigated on my end and both tools are working, you can change the department code using this steps:

	Open the EPP tool and change the IP with a random one and then the  department code 
	Restart the machine
	Once the machine is back, change the IP back to the one you have setup for your EPP server and add the same dept code as above.
	Update the policies and check if everything is in place.

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.endpointprotector.com

daniel.anton@endpointprotector.com

Hello,

Thank you for your time in today's session.

In the meeting we have checked what is causing the issue.

I have investigated on my end and both tools are working, you can change the department code using this steps:

Open the EPP tool and change the IP with a random one and then the  department code
Restart the machine
Once the machine is back, change the IP back to the one you have setup for your EPP server and add the same dept code as above.
Update the policies and check if everything is in place.

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
